EmailTemplate.subject: VMTurbo Download … What’s Next?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
Congratulations! You’ve successfully downloaded the VMTurbo Operations Manager trial software.
To activate the solution, you need to take these steps:
- First, install the appliance. If you need assistance with installation, you can refer to the installation guide <http://www.vmturbo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/02/VMTurbo-Operations-Manager-3.3.-Installation-Guide.pdf>. - Next, the setup wizard will step you through the process of requesting and installing the license key to activate Operations Manager for the term of your license. - And then the setup wizard will guide you through setting up the target configuration.
After, you should be all set to begin exploring VMTurbo Operations Manager and seeing the value it provides you in controlling your virtual or cloud environment.
Best regards,
